channel.title: How do i change the character spawn point?
channel.description: Hey guys, So I'm sort of new to all of this. Now, i want to be changing the 'home', and spawn point for my server. Also, I'd like to know how to change the equipment that the character starts off wielding. But yeah, mainly just changing the home/ spawn point. Thanks. :o

item.title: How do i change the character spawn point?
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

X_SilabScape_X:

Hey guys, So I’m sort of new to all of this. Now, i want to be changing the ‘home’, and spawn point for my server. Also, I’d like to know how to change the equipment that the character starts off wielding. But yeah, mainly just changing the home/ spawn point. Thanks. :o

Spawn Point: Go into Player class and search:

// initialization packet

Under it you should see something along the lines of:

toX = 2999;
toY = 3377;

or


teleportToX = 1234;
teleportToY = 1234;

Change the co-ordinates to whatever you want for your spawn location upon log-in.

Equipment on log-in

Still in Player class, search for

// Default appearance

or

public int pArms

until you come across something similar to this:

	public int pArms = 31;
	public int pBeard = 16;
	public int pFeet = 42;
	public int pFeetC = 3;
	public int pGender = 0;
	public int pHairC = 3;
	public int pHands = 33;
	public int pHead = 1;
	public int pLegs = 39;
	public int pLegsC = 2;
	public int pSkinC = 0;
	public int pTorso = 20;
	public int pTorsoC = 1;

Now change the numbers & there you go… New shit on log-in, lol.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the character spawn point?

item.title: How do i change the character spawn point?
item.dc:creator: @X_SilabScape_X X_SilabScape_X
item.description:
@X_SilabScape_X wrote:

[quote=“Snaz, post:2, topic:307799”]Well make a new account, then get the co-ords of that position where you logged in…

then search the X co-ord in either player.java, login.java or client.java - not sure which one, just search them all.[/quote]
Dude, I’m not THAT nooby. I’ve already searched each of them. Infact, i’ve checked just about everything. ><’
-X and Y.
